title: 帮帮忙
author: mingxi12
txt_content:
昨天还能开server玩多人但是今天就下面这样了
[INFO] Starting minecraft server version 1.4.6
[WARNING] To start the server with more ram, launch it as "java -Xmx1024M -Xms1024M -jar minecraft_server.jar"
[INFO] Loading properties
[INFO] Default game type: SURVIVAL
[INFO] Generating keypair
[INFO] Starting Minecraft server on *:25565
[WARNING] **** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!
[WARNING] The exception was: java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind
[WARNING] Perhaps a server is already running on that port?

[WARNING] **** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!  《 。。。。。。。。。。。。。。谁知道怎么解决？




啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊好惨啊

replies.author: Aikawastep
replies.txt_content: 额，。。，可不可以请你用谷歌翻译一下。。我是手机

replies.author: ylqx1997
replies.txt_content: 你另外一个服务端是不是没关？

replies.author: zzcat770
replies.txt_content: 是端口问题，你分配给MC的端口可能被别的程序占用了，需要换一个端口

replies.author: mingxi12
replies.txt_content: 我昨天把整个server文件夹拉到别的minecraft 和表妹的电脑了。。。。。。。。。。。

replies.author: wolski
replies.txt_content: {:10_493:}似乎是端口被占用了，你确定没有多开服务端，或者别的程序占用这个端口？

replies.author: ylqx1997
replies.txt_content:
mingxi12 发表于 2013-3-8 21:23 
我昨天把整个server文件夹拉到别的minecraft 和表妹的电脑了。。。。。。。。。。。
重启一遍电脑
如果不行就换个端口吧
